meanings.definition: A technique of scratching through a surface to reveal a lower layer of a contrasting color.
meanings.sent1: The artist used sgraffito to create a beautiful pattern on the pottery.
meanings.sent2: The sgraffito on the wall showcased intricate details in the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended to do sgraffito on the sand with a stick.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like sgraffito, hiding layers of emotions underneath.
meanings.sent5: The sgraffito etched on the tree trunk told a silent story of love and loss.

meanings.definition: An object or design created using the sgraffito technique.
meanings.sent1: The vase displayed a stunning sgraffito design of flowers and leaves.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate sgraffito on the wooden panel.
meanings.sent3: The cat left sgraffito marks on the wet cement as it walked through.
meanings.sent4: His words were like sgraffito, revealing hidden meanings beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The sgraffito on the ancient wall depicted scenes from a bygone era.
